trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of custom Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 組件動詞命令的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs are interactive user interface (UI) elements that are displayed in a menu or title bar of a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞命令是互動式的使用者介面 (UI) 項目 Web 組件控制項功能表或標題列中顯示。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts zone provides to a Web Parts control a standard set of verbs that are rendered in the Web Parts verb menu.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件區域 Web 組件控制項提供一組標準的 Web 組件動詞命令功能表中所呈現的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone or a Web Parts control can add additional verbs to this menu.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的 Web 組件區域或 Web 組件控制項可以加入至此功能表加入其他動詞。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides several standard verbs by default to all controls in a Web Parts zone, including the close and minimize verbs.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供了數個標準指令動詞，預設會將 Web 組件中的所有控制項的區域，其中包括關閉和最小化動詞。

trans-unit.source: There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file.
trans-unit.target: 沒有開啟、 關閉、 編輯和最小化控制項，以及用於匯出的定義控制項或載入的說明檔的其他指令動詞的標準動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: You can create new verbs that are added to the Web Parts verb menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立新的指令動詞新增至 Web 組件動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: A control can inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to a WebPartVerbCollection collection.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別，並加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>WebPartVerbCollection 集合的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This collection can then be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以再加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>控制項的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can also implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 也可以實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>介面，並覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>

trans-unit.source: You can then use a WebPartVerbCollection collection to add custom verbs to a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以接著使用 WebPartVerbCollection 集合加入至控制項的自訂動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: This class implements <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>, which provides a non-generic, read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會實作<xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>，其中提供非泛型唯讀集合。</xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>

trans-unit.source: To create a new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> using an existing collection of Web Parts verbs, you can use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>使用現有的 Web 組件動詞集合，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> class using the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref>類別使用指定的集合。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> using the specified verbs collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>使用指定的動詞集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>

trans-unit.source: This collection can be any object derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains a set of Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以是任何物件衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，其中包含 Web 組件動詞命令集。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains a set of Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 物件衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，其中包含 Web 組件動詞命令集。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> class using the specified collections.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref>類別使用指定的集合。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to combine two Web Parts verb collections.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可以用來結合兩個 Web 組件的動詞集合。

trans-unit.source: An existing <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 現有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains a set of Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 物件衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，其中包含 Web 組件動詞命令集。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Searches the Web Parts verb collection for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Web 組件動詞命令集合中搜尋<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using this method, see its base method, <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱基底方法， <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> to be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref>找到。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the Web Parts verb; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合包含的 Web 組件動詞命令。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定的陣列，指定索引處開始的集合複製項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using this method, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The array that elements are to be copied to.
trans-unit.target: 項目要複製到陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index where copying should begin.
trans-unit.target: 應該開始複製之索引。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an empty collection that you can use instead of creating a new one.
trans-unit.target: 指定您可以使用而不是建立一個新的空集合。

trans-unit.source: This static field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A static, read-only, empty instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.
trans-unit.target: 靜態、 唯讀、 空白執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>可減少在您要從方法傳回適當的物件類型，或比較執行個體與另一個物件，空集合執行個體，但您不需要將成員加入至執行個體的情況下的記憶體使用量。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified Web Parts verb and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的 Web 組件動詞命令，並傳回整個集合內第一個出現項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using this method, see <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> to be located.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref>要找出。

trans-unit.source: The index of the Web Parts verb.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Web Parts verb from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中指定索引處取得 Web 組件動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get a Web Parts verb if you know the index of the verb in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來取得 Web 組件動詞命令，如果您知道集合中的指令動詞索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Contains%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to locate a particular verb in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Contains%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.IndexOf%2A>要在集合中尋找特定動詞的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index value of the Web Parts verb to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的 Web 組件指令動詞索引值。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts verb from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞命令，從集合。
